<Text: Victoria's Secret Fashion Show 2015:  The show features some of the world's leading fashion models, including then current Victoria's Secret Angels Adriana Lima, Alessandra Ambrosio, Candice Swanepoel, Lily Aldridge, Behati Prinsloo, Elsa Hosk, Lais Ribeiro, Sara Sampaio, Jac Jagaciak, Kate Grigorieva, Martha Hunt, Taylor Hill, Jasmine Tookes, Romee Strijd and Stella Maxwell.>
